participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, enjoys outdoor activities and family time.
participant_1.background: I enjoy riding horses, but I need to be more mindful of my surroundings when I do so. I love taking my pug Corky to the dog park. I love all sorts of fresh vegetables. I hate to lose. I have one little boy named Owen.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and optimistic, with a love for nature and good food.
participant_2.background: I love food that is fresh and flavorful, especially if it's locally sourced. I like to hunt for my food. I've never been to a fortune teller because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have. I sing in the school chorus. I once saw Peyton Manning at the grocery store.

content.text: I love riding horses, but I need to be more mindful of my surroundings when I do so.
Hey, I love horses too! I like to hunt for my food. Have you ever been to a fortune teller?
I love all sorts of fresh vegetables, especially if they are locally sourced. I've never been to a fortune teller because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have.
That's a great way to think about it! I sing in the school chorus. I once saw Peyton Manning at the grocery store. What's your favorite thing to do with your little boy?
I love taking him to the dog park with my pug Corky. We have a lot of fun together.
That sounds like a great time. I love animals! What are some of your favorite fresh vegetables?
I love carrots, broccoli, and tomatoes. I also love spinach and mushrooms.
Those are all great choices! I love spinach and mushrooms too. I'm not a big fan of tomatoes, but I like them in sauces.
I used to hate tomatoes, but I started to like them when I was a little older. I still don't like them on their own, but I love them in salads and sauces.
That's funny, I'm the same way! I love them in salads and sauces, but I don't like them on their own.
I guess we have a lot in common
